alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:17PM EDT until July 13 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Otsego County in central New York... North central Delaware County in central New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 516 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cooperstown to near West End, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Worcester, Middlefield, Hartwick, Maryland, Cooperstown, Westville, Springfield, Otego and Westford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
